vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπάνω [ᾰ],
adverb, (ἄνω) above, on the upper side or part, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; with Article, ὁ ἐ. πύργος the upper tower, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 as preposition, with genitive, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἐ. γεγονότες κακίας having risen superior to.., [Refs 1st c.AD+] set over, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__3 before, in front of, with genitive, [LXX]; in the presence of, τινός [Refs 4th c.AD+]
__II above, in a book, ἐν τοῖς ἐ. εἴρηται [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__III of Time, ἐν τοῖς ἐ. χρόνοις in former times, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__IV of Relationship, πατέρες καὶ τούτων ἐ. [Refs 4th c.BC+]; ἐ. ὄντες Εὐρωπαῖοι citizens of Europus in unbroken descent, Cumont Fouilles de Doura-Europos [Refs]
__V in Logic, τὸ ἐ. γένος the genus or species above, opposed to τὰ ὑποκάτω, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__VI of Number, above, more, ἀπὸ εἰκοσαετοῦς καὶ ἐ. [LXX]; above, more than, ἐ. τριακοσίων δηναρίων [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: - up above, i.e. over or on (of place, amount, rank, etc.)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: - up above, i.e. over or on (of place, amount, rank, etc.)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1) prep. con gen. en, sobre ; sobre, más de ; más que ; (2) adv. encima, sobre (LUC.11:44) ; más que (1CO.15:6)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 在...之上
2) 多於
3) 勝於 (地位優越)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 在...之上
2) 多于
3) 胜于 (地位优越)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bên trên; ở trên. ἐπί (G1909) + ἄνω (G507)
